name: AdrichReplenishment
0: ”Alexa, ask Adrich Replenishment how much product I have left?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: adrich replenishment
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Using the Adrich Smart Label ecosystem, this skill can report real-time product info & enable smart reordering for your Adrich Smart Label-enabled products through Amazon's DRS service.

After linking your Adrich account with this skill, simply use your products & your usage statistics will be available with Alexa. Your Adrich Smart Label products will appear as devices within your Alexa app. Going into device settings will allow you to track your usage data & configure smart reordering. 

You can query your usage data in real-time by say: "Alexa, ask Adrich Replenishment how much [product] I have left".

Using Adrich Replenishment requires an Adrich account & one or more products enabled with Adrich Smart Label hardware.
